content.question: Which of the following was NOT a significant effect of the changes shown in the graph and the broader economic trends of which they were a part?

choices.label: A shift in liberal ideology away from laissez-faire in favor of more government intervention
The spread of industrialization from Great Britain to the rest of Europe
The emergence of labor unions and movements promoting economic reforms
The growth of consumerism as more industrially manufactured goods became available

content.answer: The spread of industrialization from Great Britain to the rest of Europe

topic.text: 6.10: Causation in the Age of Industrialization

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
